org.lenskit.mooc.svd

Class SVDModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.mooc.svd.SVDModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Shareable
 @DefaultProvider(value=SVDModelBuilder.class)
public class SVDModel
extends Object
implements Serializable
    SVD model for collaborative filtering.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getFeatureWeights

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getFeatureWeights()
        Get the feature weights. This is a diagonal matrix.
        Returns:
        The diagonal matrix of feature weights.

      • getUserVector

        @Nullable
public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getUserVector(long user)
        Get a user feature vector. This is a row vector whose values (columns) are the feature values for a particular user.
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        Returns:
        The feature vector for user user, or null if the user is unkonwn.

      • getItemVector

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getItemVector(long item)
        Get a item feature vector. This is a row vector whose values (columns) are the feature values for a particular item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        Returns:
        The feature vector for item item.

      • getItemFeatureMatrix

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getItemFeatureMatrix()
        Get a item feature vector matrix. Its rows are items and its columns are latent features.
        Returns:
        The item-feature matrix (this must not be modified).

      • getUserFeatureMatrix

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix getUserFeatureMatrix()
        Get a user feature vector matrix. Its rows are users and its columns are latent features.
        Returns:
        The user-feature matrix (this must not be modified).

      • getUserIndexMapping

        public KeyIndex getUserIndexMapping()
        Get the user index mapping.
        Returns:
        The mapping between user IDs and matrix row numbers.

      • getItemIndexMapping

        public KeyIndex getItemIndexMapping()
        Get the item index mapping.
        Returns:
        The mapping between item IDs and matrix row numbers.

      • getItemRow

        public int getItemRow(long item)
        Get the row number for an item in the item-feature matrix.
        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        Returns:
        The row number for the item.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the item is unknown.
